# Savings

Savings

## SAVE
Ever saved money

Levels: 
+ 1="Yes"
+ 0= "No"

## SAVE_KNOW_INTEREST
Know interest rate on saving: counts repondents who have ever saved money and know the interest rate earned on their savings.

Levels: 
+ 1="Yes"
+ 0= "No"

## SAVE_INFML
Ever saved with informal channels: counts respondents  who ever saved money with people they trust (e.g., family, friends, neighbors, shopkeepers, money guards, savings collectors) or with a self-help group or cooperative without membership.

Levels: 
+ 1="Yes"
+ 0= "No"
